name: Practiced Dreamer
text: Your time in the Dimension of Dreams has improved your ability to manipulate its landscape.
benefit: Once per day, you can reroll a failed attempt to perform an impossible action, such as casting a spell you canâ€™t normally cast, gaining an effect of a spell as if it had been cast, or conjuring a magic item. You also gain an additional +2 bonus on Charisma checks to determine your initial condition when entering a dream with your lucid body.
